titleStmt.title: [Receipt] 1816 Aug. 12, for field slave, [to] William Brown / James Brown : a machine readable transcription of an image
titleStmt.author: Brown, James

availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Receipt] 1816 Aug. 12, for field slave, [to] William Brown / James Brown
bibl.author: Brown, James
bibl.note: This is a receipt written by James Brown for a slave on behalf of Joseph and William Brown. It is dated August 12, 1816

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.p: Received of Joseph Brown one Note of hand on William Brown for one likely sound field Negro Betwean Between the age of fourteen and twenty five years to be Delivered in Washington County of North Carolina which Note was given to me by the said William Brown on the 12th of October 1789 and Due the 5th of December 1790 and Was assigned by me to the said Joseph Brown on the 16th of January 1806 for Collection if he Could for which Collection the said Joseph Brown give me he his Receipt which Receipt I have lost or Mislaid so that I Cannot find it ‚ÅÅ at this time given under my hand the Date above written
